chartkit.error-incorrect-key-value-intro: Incorrect notation of an object passed to
chartkit.error-incorrect-key: , object keys must be convertible to integer
chartkit.error-incorrect-value: , object values must be a string or a function which returns a string

error.label_invalid-axis-category-data-point: It seems you are trying to use inappropriate data type for "{{key}}" value in series "{{seriesName}}" for axis with type "category". Strings and numbers are allowed.
error.label_invalid-axis-datetime-data-point: It seems you are trying to use inappropriate data type for "{{key}}" value in series "{{seriesName}}" for axis with type "datetime". Only numbers are allowed.
error.label_invalid-axis-linear-data-point: It seems you are trying to use inappropriate data type for "{{key}}" value in series "{{seriesName}}" for axis with type "linear". Numbers and nulls are allowed.
error.label_invalid-pie-data-value: It seems you are trying to use inappropriate data type for "value" value. Only numbers are allowed.
error.label_invalid-series-type: It seems you haven't defined "series.type" property, or defined it incorrectly. Available values: [{{types}}].
error.label_invalid-series-property: It seems you are trying to use inappropriate value for "{{key}}", or defined it incorrectly. Available values: [{{values}}].
error.label_invalid-treemap-redundant-value: It seems you are trying to set "value" for container node. Check node with this properties: { id: "{{id}}", name: "{{name}}" }
error.label_invalid-treemap-missing-value: It seems you are trying to use node without "value". Check node with this properties: { id: "{{id}}", name: "{{name}}" }
